descriptionHtml:
I change the bored green metal for two kinds of realistic metals, in the front of the shield i put a nice and scratched metal, in the back i put a slightly scratched metal, also i added more saturation and some contrast resulting in a genuine damaged and filthy ork shield. 

Installation
Use winrar to get the .dds and drop the archive in Data/textures/armor/orcish if you don\'t have a folder, create it then.

Uninstallation
Remove the orcishield.dds from Data/textures/armor/orcish

I\'ll be adding the armor set and the weapons set for orcish, only i aks you to be patient.
author: wotecorix
